Perkuat Keamanan dan Fitur Baru, Axisnet Manjakan Pengguna
04 Nov 2019, 14:53 by Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Axisnet. (Foto: detikINET/Aisyah Kamaliah)

Jakarta - Axis menelurkan sejumlah fitur baru dari aplikasi miliknya, Axisnet, untuk memperkuat keamanan dan memanjakan penggunanya. Frengky Rinaldo Pakpahan Vice President XL Axiata West Region menjelaskan, ada dua alasan fitur-fitur tersebut muncul."Mengapa? Cuma ada dua kata, satu customer, kedua kemudahan. Kami mau memudahkan target kita yaitu youth," jelasnya dalam acara peluncuran fitur baru Axisnet, di Jakarta, Kamis (4/11/2019).Pertama, ada fitur penawaran terbaik yang rekomendasinya lebih personal. Misalnya, penawaran diskon spesial sesuai dengan kalangan anak muda dengan harga terbaik untuk customer. Ada juga surprise gift berupa paket spesifik untuk konten yang sedang trend seperti aplikasi Free Fire atau Hago."Nah, inilah fitur spesial yang mungkin pertama di dunia, lock button feature. Jadi mungkin ada yang tiba-tiba sering kali bingung pulsanya hilang buat apa, nah fitur lock ini, di-lock data atau lainnya. Jadi apabila kehabisan kuota dia tidak akan makan pulsa, begitu juga paket SMS. Akan ada SMS service apa saja yang di-lock," jelasnya.Meski begitu, Axis mengaku tak ingin gegabah menyebutkan keamanan bisa 100% bisa dijamin. Selalu ada bugs yang bisa saja muncul. Namun, pihaknya telah berusaha sebisa mungkin agar keamanan pengguna selalu terjaga."Ketiga, kita ingin memberi hadiah untuk pengguna loyal Axis, setiap pembelian voucher fisik bisa mendapatkan hadiah kalau diklik," sambungnya.Jadi, semakin banyak penawaran pelanggan akan bisa naik level-nya, misalnya dari silver ke gold. Ada banyak juga bonus dari Google Play voucher, dan Traveloka yang bisa diklaim dan kemudian di-redeem. Tak ketinggalan, ada juga hadiah yang diundi setiap bulan.Pelanggan baru pun ikut dimanjakan lewat kejutan hadiah baru seperti kuota malam, musik, game dengan besar kuota 512 mb. Strengthen Security and New Features, Axisnet Spoil Users
Nov 04 2019, 14:53 by Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Axisnet. (Photo: detikINET / Aisyah Kamaliah)

Jakarta - Axis spawned a number of new features from its application, Axisnet, to strengthen security and pamper its users. Frengky Rinaldo Pakpahan, Vice President of XL Axiata West Region explained, there are two reasons these features appear. "Why? There are only two words, one customer, both convenience. We want to facilitate our target, namely youth," he explained in the launch of the new Axisnet feature , in Jakarta, Thursday (11/04/2019). First, there is the best bidding feature with more personalized recommendations. For example, special discount offers that suit young people at the best prices for customers. There is also a surprise gift in the form of a specific package for content that is trending like the Free Fire or Hago application. "Now, this is a special feature that may be the first in the world, a lock button feature. now this lock feature is locked or other data. So if it runs out of quota he will not eat credit, so does the SMS package. There will be any SMS service that is locked, "he explained. Even so, Axis claimed not to want to rashly mention security can be 100% guaranteed. There are always bugs that can appear. However, it has tried as much as possible so that user security is always maintained. "Third, we want to give gifts to loyal Axis users, every physical voucher purchase can get a prize if clicked," he continued. So, the more offers customers will be able to level up , for example from silver to gold. There are also many bonuses from Google Play vouchers, and Traveloka that can be claimed and then redeemed. Not to forget, there are also prizes that are drawn every month. New customers are also spoiled through new prize surprises like night quota, music, games with a large quota of 512 mb.
